title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When using build 20021001, if the user gets a welcome page when they restart (by removing the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata) and clicks on any link in the welcome page, the appropriate action is executed. However, upon returning to the welcome page, the clicked link is not selected. The ProductInfoDialog dialog currently selects links when clicked, which provides more context to the user. But this behavior is not observed for other links on the welcome page.
EB: The links on the welcome page should be selected when clicked, just like the ProductInfoDialog dialog does, to provide more context to the user when they return to the welcome page.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Use build 20021001
2. Make sure you get a welcome page when you restart (by removing the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata)
3. Click on any link in the welcome page
4. Observe that the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when you return to the welcome page
